title: how do i save replays to my computer.
body: hey im working on a video and i need some help, i don't know how to save them to my computer please help me.

replies.body: Are you on the updated client?  You should see replays available in your match history tab as long as it's in the same patch.  Otherwise per the the[ replays guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips), you can find highlights in your Documents folder as well.  I hope that helps!
